function.name: BookRestaurant
function.description: This tool allows you to book and reserve a table at a restaurant based on a location.

spatial_relation.description: The type of spatial relation with the location.

city.description: City where the restaurant is located.

timeRange.description: Time range for reservation.

party_size_number.description: Number of people in the party.

state.description: State where the restaurant is located.

sort.description: Sort the restaurant results. Possible values include: price, popularity, rating and alphabetical.

restaurant_type.description: Type of restaurant, e.g. Indian, Italian, Chinese

cuisine.description: Type of cuisine served at the restaurant.

served_dish.description: Name of the dish served at the restaurant.

country.description: Country where the restaurant is located.

party_size_description.description: Number of people in the party.

poi.description: Point of interest, a location where the restaurant is located.
